english_sentence: I saw the film last week.
He wrote well in the examination.

kumaoni_sentence: Tumul kei karouh/tumul key kar rakhoh?

english_sentence: What is written in the letter?
Why did you tell him to go?
kumaoni_sentence: Tumhul ukki jaan lizi kile bolo?

english_sentence: Why did he bring the bag?
Why did she pay the money?
Why do you drive the car?
Why are they late for the meeting?
kumaoni_sentence: Wu meeting lizi der kile krnai?

english_sentence: How many apples are there in my hand?
How much did he pay you?
In which room did you sleep?
kumaoni_sentence: Tum koh waal kamra me sitchaa?

english_sentence: Which is the best newspaper in Hindi?
kumaoni_sentence: Ku wal akhbar hindi m sabsey bhal chuu?

english_sentence: Which Indian state has the largest population?
kumaoni_sentence: Ku wal rajya  janshankyan sabsey jad chi?

english_sentence: Can you give me your pen?
kumaoni_sentence: Ke tu mekei apun pen di sakchein?
Tu kas chai?/ Kas cha tum?
